ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“Come on, let's go!
Bodyguard!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“Come on, let's go!
Bodyguard!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“Funny…”{PAUSE}“I thought you were cut
out to be in SOLDIER.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“Hey…{Cloud}.
Were you…ever in SOLDIER?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“…I used to be.
How did you guess?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Aeris}
“…Your eyes.
They have a strange glow…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“That's the sign of those who
have been infused with Mako…”{PAUSE}“A mark of SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“But, how did you know
about that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“Come on, let's go!
Bodyguard!”

[SAVE POINT]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
